Analyze the roles of state and
federal agencies and how
they govern animal industries,
international trade, and animal
production policies.

E06C82C5E05F4F2E82D20CB74218B25B.description:
Identify the types of laws
pertaining to animal
production, marketing, and
management.

875A9871B3534AC98AB4D3918A673D56.description:
Analyze laws
and sustainable
practices that
impact animal
agriculture from
a local, tribal,
state, national,
and global
perspective.

FCA7AE9F1F154C0D95036513B3EC968A.description:
Design plans to manage
wildlife populations to achieve
a balance of optimal ecological
health and animal production.

69A32ACCB4B5456BBD5008B52B5B306D.description:
Analyze local wildlife
populations, challenges, and
ecological measures that are
being utilized as they relate to
animal production.

8A0299F514954348A272763421CB3DFA.description:
Identify wildlife management
methods (e.g., depredation,
invasive issues, biosecurity,
habitat improvement, etc.)
as they relate to animal
production.

DB33E9B331EB4C288594B45D7B7C176D.description:
Appraise the use of a specific
record management system
based upon its effectiveness
for a business related to animal
systems.

F64354B498F4461199318F3CDD37CC68.description:
Execute effective record
keeping and documentation
practice for animal enterprises.

3B83CC29CFFD44BEB35E20EB5822B05C.description:
Summarize the types,
purposes, and characteristics
of effective record keeping
and documentation practices
for animal enterprises
(e.g., breeding and genetic
improvement, medical
treatment, financial, legal
requirements, etc.).

8840482043A84ADE927FE9AC3B5F4664.description:
Develop marketing plans for an
animal agriculture product or
service.

BACA7ADA90D84D18891837E4DF731E20.description:
Determine costs of marketing
versus predicted increases in
sales.

5BFA77FD23B3497AAD2B9F6461CDCCCE.description:
Compare marketing methods
for animal products and
services (e.g., conventional,
niche markets, locally grown,
etc.).

267DE09DB54E400A9299B9056740226B.description:
Evaluate the effectiveness
of different production,
marketing, and management
methods using data and
evidence.

F1FA3BE83C1A4AEB8054F90B57F33604.description:
Analyze the impact of animal
production, marketing, and
management methods on
end product quality (e.g., price,
sustainability, transportation,
labeling, animal welfare, etc.).

0EF196130E8941418A467E7E09146D59.description:
Define terms and methods
related to animal production,
marketing, and management
(e.g., sustainable, conventional,
responsibly sourced, quality
assurance, natural, organic,
etc.).

6C7608357B10491D82965221449EE883.description:
Assess and
select animal
production,
marketing, and
management
methods
based upon
effectiveness
and potential
social and
environmental
impacts.

E88EB16E35B34147A2E404705C876C5D.description:
Evaluate trends (e.g., labor,
economic, environmental,
etc.) and implications of
future developments within
different animal industries on
production practices and the
environment.

BBAAEBA3B86E4EFBB914AF4F2767759A.description:
Analyze the development of
a variety of animal industries,
technological advancements,
research, and engineering
practices and how they
influenced products, services,
and careers.

BD6EABAAECE049E59BCC373445E389EF.description:
Summarize major components
of animal industrial systems
(e.g., livestock, small animal,
research, etc.).

C949E41214154A70B8C1FA1B040DCA7C.description:
Evaluate the implications
of animal characteristics on
production practices and the
environment.

7C6477F925E049F2910AF57B988DF3DB.description:
Examine characteristics of
animals that developed in
response to environmental and
production related influences.

52C7B86166FE47898742B6488B470496.description:
Summarize the origin,
significance, distribution, and
domestication of different
animal species.

3BA07366D550486DAF4CF364482A9DE0.description:
Evaluate
the development
and implications
of animal origin,
domestication,
and distribution
on production
practices and the
environment.

D359ED1E9CC04CD0949D7BD10D994352.description:
Analyze historic and current trends impacting the
animal systems industry.
